item.title: ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Though the ALYS crowdfunding campaign that we announced previously was set to go live on March 31st, some were able to access it beforehand, and the project reached 25% completion even before its announced launch date! Read on for information about the Au Delà du Rêve campaign, details on how you can contribute, and what rewards …

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Though the ALYS crowdfunding campaign that we announced previously was set to go live on March 31st, some were able to access it beforehand, and the project reached 25% completion even before its announced launch date!

Read on for information about the Au Delà du Rêve campaign, details on how you can contribute, and what rewards are on offer.

La campagne démarre officiellement le 31 mars, mais certains ont pu le voir, la page Ulule Au Delà du Rêve est déjà accessible: https://t.co/jB6P9QepoN

Le projet est déjà financé à 25% avant même le début de la campagne, merci infiniment à tout les contributeurs !

— VoxWave@AuDelàDuRêve (@VoxWave_Studio) March 30, 2018

Campaign Details

“Au Delà du Rêve” is both a literary and musical project, consisting of both an audio album and a collection of short stories.

The aim of the project is to create a narrative and build a universe around the character of ALYS.

With this project, VoxWave hopes to share the adventures of ALYS with an even wider audience than before.

The campaign goal is €5000 and, at the time of writing, the project is already 35% funded!

The crowdfunding campaign will come to an end on April 28th, 2018.

Rewards

There are various rewards on offer to the contributors of this campaign. Here is a summary of each of the reward tiers.

The following monetary value is in USD.

Support – $7 or more

  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”

Digital version $15 –  or more

  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Book – $21 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

CD – $30 or more

  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Book+ CD – $44 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReader

Book + CD + Instrumental Version – $51 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders

Cameo – $123 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • A cameo in one of the illustrations “Dystopie” or “Utopie” (You may choose which one of the two you wish to have your cameo in, though please note that only 10 of each will be available.)

Figurine – $259 or more

  • Unpainted ALYS Figure

Colored Figurine – $444 or more

  • Painted ALYS figure

All in one – $512 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • Painted ALYS figure

All in one + Cameo – $574 or more

  • Physical copy of the book “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • Three collector’s edition postcards of the songs “Sous cette pluie,” “Dystopie,” and “Utopie”
  • The CD “Au Delà du Rêve”
  • The instrumental version of the Album “Au Delà du Rêve” as  well as in readable format.
  • The book “Au Delà du Rêve” in digital format compatible with eReaders
  • A cameo in one of the illustrations “Dystopie” or “Utopie”
  • Painted ALYS figure

How to contribute

If you would like to contribute to the crowdfunding campaign, you can start by visiting the Ulule campaign page here.

Once there, you can sign in or register if you don’t already have an account.

To begin the process of pledging to the campaign, you must first select one of the reward tiers from the right-hand side of the page.

If you would prefer to not receive a reward for your pledge, simply click the last option in the list.

Once you select your reward tier, you may be prompted to select your country from a drop-down menu if your reward requires postage.

Please note that there is an extra charge for postage, which will be shown next to the country that you select.

Once you have made your selection, simply click the confirmation button at the bottom of the window.

If you do not already have an address and credit card details saved in your account, you will be prompted to enter these in the next page.

Once you confirm your details, you should see a thank you message as confirmation.

Please note that no funds will be taken from your account until the end of the campaign period and will only be processed if the campaign is successfully funded by that time.

Link

Ulule campaign page

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign now live! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign Opening Soon
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
ALYS has had many projects during her lifetime, many of which have been with the help of fans. One such project was a trans-media creative project in the form of a book, detailing many stories within the inter-world of the ALYS universe as well as an album related to those stories. In order to support …

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign Opening Soon appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
ALYS has had many projects during her lifetime, many of which have been with the help of fans. One such project was a trans-media creative project in the form of a book, detailing many stories within the inter-world of the ALYS universe as well as an album related to those stories.

In order to support this project, VoxWave is calling on the public through a crowdfunding campaign on Ulule‘s platform, starting March 31st!

ALYS thus becomes a trans-media heroin. She can be seen as many things from a singer, traveler and more in fantastic stories written by various authors. Most notably, this includes Joffrey Collignon, co-founder of VoxWave studio and executive producer of ALYS’ live show, “Rêve de Machine”. The stories invite readers into various worlds, sometimes magical and sometimes more technological. They set things up for an epic adventure inspired both by mythology and contemporary manga, such as Berserk or Captain Harlock!

Numerous artists have collaborated on these projects, such as the following:

  • Lightning, music composer for ALYS’ songs “Sous cette Pluie” and “Oxygène” as well as his solo album “Break the Cage”.
  • Jet Nebula, music composer of LEORA’s first song “Fugitive“
  • Anthony Lo Re, winner of the VOCALYS contest and music composer for the album “Souvenirs Oubliés“.
  • Illustrators like DariaP, Acetea and Saphirya
  • Authors like Joffrey Collignon.

This crowdfunding campaign aims to gain funds to publish the first volume of the stories, along with the album. Rewards range from postcard sets to the ALYS collector’s figure and, of course, the pre-order of the book and the album.

This campaign will start on March 31st, with a 5000€ goal! You can find the link to the campaign here.

Information Source

Ulule

The post ALYS Crowdfunding Campaign Opening Soon appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New Albums ‘ALYS Around the World’ and ‘Solstice 2017’ from VoxWave!
item.dc:creator: Jade Kaiba
item.description:
Today, we bring you news of two new albums from VoxWave, ‘Solstice 2017’ and ‘ALYS Around the World!’ Solstice 2017 First off, VoxWave has announced the album ‘Solstice 2017,’ featuring ALYS and LEORA! Tweets by VoxWave_Studio The album will be available on iTunes, Spotify, Google Play, Amazon and Deezer. So far, the songs which have been …

The post New Albums ‘ALYS Around the World’ and ‘Solstice 2017’ from VoxWave! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Today, we bring you news of two new albums from VoxWave, ‘Solstice 2017’ and ‘ALYS Around the World!’

Solstice 2017

First off, VoxWave has announced the album ‘Solstice 2017,’ featuring ALYS and LEORA!

Tweets by VoxWave_Studio

The album will be available on iTunes, Spotify, Google Play, Amazon and Deezer.

So far, the songs which have been announced for the album are:

  • Prélude à l’Intermonde feat. ALYS
  • Rêves d’enfant feat. ALYS
  • Au bout de mes rêves feat. ALYS
  • A toute épreuve feat. ALYS & LEORA
  • Crépuscule ou Aurore feat. ALYS
  • Amoureuses l’une de l’autre feat. ALYS
  • Amour perdu feat. ALYS
  • Océan de nuages feat. ALYS
  • Nouveau Monde feat. ALYS
  • Imaginary feat ALYS & LEORA

Pre-order ‘Solstice 2017’ on Bandcamp

You can listen to the songs which will appear on the album by checking out the YouTube playlist below.

ALYS Around the World

VoxWave has also released a cover album called ‘ALYS Around the World,’ which features 8 songs that were originally sung by ALYS, and covered in 7 different languages.

Here is the tracklist of the 8 songs featured on the album:

  1. Hajime Ni (feat. Mioune) (French Version)
  2. Oxygène (feat. Kal) (German Version)
  3. Le Paradoxe de ma Vie (feat. Kasuka) (Japanese Version)
  4. Soleil (feat. TBK)
  5. Sous cette pluie (feat. SUYA) (Korean Version)
  6. Nouvel Eden (feat. Giita) (Indonesian Version)
  7. Danse avec moi (feat. NiNa) (Italian Version)
  8. Luna Light (feat. Jet Nebula) [Escape Remix] [BONUS TRACK]

‘ALYS Around the World’ is currently available digitally from Bandcamp, or you can buy a physical copy from VoxWave’s online shop.

The album will also be available on iTunes, Spotify, Google Play, Amazon and Deezer.

Buy ‘ALYS Around the World’ on Bandcamp

Buy ‘ALYS Around the World’ on VoxWave’s E-Shop

If you want to hear a preview of the ‘ALYS Around the World’ album, check out the crossfade on YouTube below.

More Information

For more information on ALYS and LEORA, visit VoxWave’s website.

The post New Albums ‘ALYS Around the World’ and ‘Solstice 2017’ from VoxWave! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: LEORA is Now Released!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The newest Alter/Ego “LEORA” by VoxWave has now officially been released! If you are not familiar with LEORA, she is a French and English voice bank for the Alter/Ego software. This is the second voice bank by VoxWave, who also created the French and Japanese voice bank “ALYS” for the same engine. She is voiced …

The post LEORA is Now Released! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The newest Alter/Ego “LEORA” by VoxWave has now officially been released! If you are not familiar with LEORA, she is a French and English voice bank for the Alter/Ego software. This is the second voice bank by VoxWave, who also created the French and Japanese voice bank “ALYS” for the same engine. She is voiced by the French YouTaite TBK.

If you liked ALYS, then you will also like LEORA. Not only that, with an English voice bank, English users will be able to finally try out an English Alter/Ego by VoxWave!

She will come with four voice banks:

  • English Core
  • English Power
  • French Core
  • French Power

Note: Currently only her French voice banks is available, however, her English voice banks will be added for free in a later update. She is currently an early access and is still in development.

You can purchase her on VoxWave’s official website for €70,00 EUR ($80 USD) here.

If you want to have an idea of what she sounds like, there is a demo of her as well!

Links

VoxWave’s Official Website

LEORA’s Official Facebook Page

The post LEORA is Now Released! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VNN Interview with TBK at Dokomi 2017!
item.dc:creator: dotkrawl
item.description:
This year, VoxWave attended Dokomi in Germany! And, of course, it wouldn’t be a full VoxWave party without The Baka Kitsune (TBK), Co-Founder of VoxWave, Youtaite, and voice provider of LEORA. The German division of VNN was lucky enough to be able to ask her a few questions about everything she’s involved in. Here’s VNN’s …

The post VNN Interview with TBK at Dokomi 2017! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
This year, VoxWave attended Dokomi in Germany! And, of course, it wouldn’t be a full VoxWave party without The Baka Kitsune (TBK), Co-Founder of VoxWave, Youtaite, and voice provider of LEORA. The German division of VNN was lucky enough to be able to ask her a few questions about everything she’s involved in. Here’s VNN’s interview with TBK!

The Interview

VNN: How are you enjoying Dokomi and Germany so far?

TBK: It’s really great! I came to Germany for the last time five years ago, so I was really happy to be able to come back here. It’s a great time and opportunity to practice my German, too!

 

VNN: Is there anything you personally want to say to your fans?

TBK: Keep loving virtual singers! This team is awesome, okay? And keep doing what you like in life. Everything is good, everything is great!

 

VNN: Regarding your recent work on LEORA, how was recording for you?

TBK: I already did record an UTAU before, my UTAU Guren Nataku, so I was kinda used to the process. But it was also different with LEORA because we wanted it to be really precise and Drak-pa kept telling me to re-record samples because we needed to have the phoneme sounds to be really precise and specific. So it was a bit longer. We took like an entire weekend to record the French and I still have to record the English, which will be the hardest part, but I really enjoyed it!

I’m pretty surprised because LEORA actually has a beautiful high lyrical voice and really beautiful high notes, and I just have recorded a medium voice range, so I’m kinda confused. I have no idea where they come from, but it’s cool because it’s kinda complimentary? I can’t sing high notes very well and she can sing them for me, which is really cool.

VNN: What was your first reaction when you heard LEORA for the first time?

TBK: Joffrey told me, “Oh, I can hear your voice in LEORA,” and I was like, “Oh, really?” because I’m so used to my raw natural voice during the recording process, so it feels completely different for me to hear it through a voice synthesizer. I really don’t see LEORA as a copy of my voice, really not! I think it’s a new being, a new entity. It’s really interesting.

 

VNN: How would you describe the relationship between LEORA and ALYS?

TBK: We made LEORA as kind of an “Alter/Ego,” if I can say it like that, of ALYS so that she can be everything you want her to be! Some people see them as lovers, others as best friends or even enemies. I personally see it as they’re from the same world, so they’re just here together. I like all of the things that they can do together?

 

VNN: And how would you describe YOUR personal relationship with LEORA?

TBK: Uhm, that’s a hard one. I see her like she is a part of me. She’s everything I can’t do in public. I like to see her as a warrior, as a berserker, and a strong woman! Sometimes I’m angry and I can’t really publicly say, “I want to destroy it!” But I feel like LEORA has this attitude where she would say it. I like her; she is my girl, my fighting girl. She’s our girl with VoxWave and everyone’s girl.

 

VNN: If you could say something to LEORA in person, what would that be?

TBK: Never give up.

 

VNN: Would you like to perform some day with her side by side?

TBK: Yes, definitely! To be honest, I already asked Joffrey to do a duet song with LEORA because I really think it would be great and, as I said, she has beautiful high notes. So I think I can do the low parts and she can take over the high parts. I really want to try it!

 

VNN: What do you wish for LEORA in the future?

TBK: I hope that people will welcome her just like they did with ALYS. She isn’t here to replace ALYS; she’s here to help her! She’s here to bring forth a new part of their universe. So I really hope people will enjoy LEORA and make songs with her. I just want her to bring something to people.

Follow TBK

You can follow TBK on the following websites:

Official Website
YouTube
Facebook
Twitter

Follow VoxWave

In addition, you can follow VoxWave on these websites:

Official Website
Facebook
Twitter
YouTube
NND

The post VNN Interview with TBK at Dokomi 2017! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: EMANCIPATION Album Now Available!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
The newest ALYS album, titled EMANCIPATION, is now available for purchase both physically and digitally. In this album however, there is also a song featuring their upcoming voice bank, LEORA! You can purchase the physical album on VoxWave’s official website. You can find the digital download on multiple download sites such as Bandcamp, Google Play, …

The post EMANCIPATION Album Now Available! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The newest ALYS album, titled EMANCIPATION, is now available for purchase both physically and digitally. In this album however, there is also a song featuring their upcoming voice bank, LEORA! You can purchase the physical album on VoxWave’s official website. You can find the digital download on multiple download sites such as Bandcamp, Google Play, and Spotify.

Album

If you order the physical copy, you will receive an ALYS key chain for free! If that was not enough, the first 100 buyers will also receive an exclusive postcard of the album cover.

 

Tracklist

  1. Au coeur des studios Voxwave
  2. Oxygène
  3. Le Paradoxe de ma Vie
  4. Nouvel Eden
  5. Ensemble
  6. Danse avec moi
  7. Fugitive
  8. À l’aube de ce jour de Noël
  9. Sexfriend
  10. Appelle-moi et ça ira (Live)
  11. Horizons
  12. Un monde alyst (Live)
  13. Luna Light

Crossfade

A crossfade of the album is also available on their YouTube channel.

If you are a fan of ALYS, get your copy now!

VoxWave’s Official Website

The post EMANCIPATION Album Now Available! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
A new update is now available on Zyon, and this time around, it is the French virtual singer ALYS, created by VoxWave! The pack includes the songs “Hajime Ni,” “SHARDS,” “Neutrino,” and “Sous Cette Pluie” performed by ALYS as well as her very own theme. You also have a chance to win a “Zyon Emblem” which …

The post ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A new update is now available on Zyon, and this time around, it is the French virtual singer ALYS, created by VoxWave! The pack includes the songs “Hajime Ni,” “SHARDS,” “Neutrino,” and “Sous Cette Pluie” performed by ALYS as well as her very own theme.

You also have a chance to win a “Zyon Emblem” which gives you access to all of the songs by sharing Zyon‘s Facebook post.

New update featuring ALYS theme for free.Come and see this sweet French virtual idol performing her wonderful voice in…

Posted by Zyon 載音 on Friday, May 26, 2017

Another recent addition to Zyon is Yan Xi. Who is Yan Xi, you ask? Yan Xi is a Chinese virtual singer from the MUTA synthesizer software.

On top of all this, several new Luo Tianyi and YanHe songs have also been made available!

Zyon is currently available on Android and iOS.

For more information on Zyon, check out our page here.

Official Links

VoxWave’s Website
Yan Xi’s Website

The post ALYS and Yan Xi Available on Zyon! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: VoxWave and BIGHEAD at Dokomi!
item.dc:creator: dotkrawl
item.description:
German VOCALOID fans can celebrate! Dokomi, the biggest convention in Germany, has announced some special vocal synth related guests for this year’s convention! Both Joffrey from VoxWave and the well-known VOCALOID producer, BIGHEAD, are going to attend the convention, and hold workshops and panels during the weekend! The con takes place on June 3rd and 4th in …

The post VoxWave and BIGHEAD at Dokomi! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
German VOCALOID fans can celebrate! Dokomi, the biggest convention in Germany, has announced some special vocal synth related guests for this year’s convention! Both Joffrey from VoxWave and the well-known VOCALOID producer, BIGHEAD, are going to attend the convention, and hold workshops and panels during the weekend! The con takes place on June 3rd and 4th in Düsseldorf, Germany.

VoxWave

Joffrey, CEO of VoxWave, is hosting a workshop on Saturday that will be giving insight into VoxWave’s production of virtual singers, like ALYS and LEORA.

European Virtual Singers: ALYS and LEORA

Inspired by the big Japanese virtual icons like Hatsune Miku, ALYS and LEORA are ready to take the hearts of European fans by storm! Discover this world together with Joffrey, the CEO of VoxWave, during our workshop.

  • Workshop Leader: VoxWave
  • Date: Saturday, June 3rd at 11:00 AM ~ 1:00 PM
  • Location: Messe Düsseldorf, Room 5

BIGHEAD

Another VOCALOID related person on site is going to be BIGHEAD, also known for the main theme song of MIKU EXPO 2014, “Sharing The World!” Along with a workshop on Sunday, he’s going to be one of the DJs at the J-Disco on Saturday from 8:30 PM (MESZ) onward… but that’s not all! Visitors of Dokomi will have the chance to grab a limited version of his first cassette tape exclusively produced for the convention, in addition to some of his previous albums and some shirts!

Music Workshop with BIGHEAD

With “Hatsune Miku” you can produce singing voices digitally with your computer. During this workshop, the musician BIGHEAD is going to showcase how this is being done with VOCALOID.

  • Workshop Leader: BIGHEAD
  • Date: Sunday, June 4th at 2:00 PM ~ 4:00 PM (MESZ)
  • Location: Messe Düsseldorf, Room 5

About the Album

BIGHEAD already announced his new album “REWIND 93” in April, which was also sold at the Japanese album release fair M3. Exclusively for Dokomi, BIGHEAD has created a “Dokomi version” of his cassette tape. The German design of the cassette was illustrated by chamy and contains a whole 6 tracks by BIGHEAD and RYOTA YOSHIZUMI to enjoy! To those who don’t have a cassette player (anymore) don’t fret! Along with the album, you’ll receive a download card which enables you to download the high-quality WAV and MP3 files of the songs encoded in 24bit and 48khz for your current electronic generation!

REWIND 93′ Dokomi Edition

Tracklist

01. “Road Into Your Love”
02. “Register Girl”
03.” AITAISEI RIRON”
04. “LAST DREAM”
05. “The Sound In You”
06. “ONLY STAR”

For those who wish to purchase a copy of the album, it will be available at BIGHEAD’s booth at Dokomi in Hall 15/L-05 during his autograph sessions. Please note that the stocks of the cassette are limited, so be sure to grab one quickly! They will cost €15 EUR (about $17 USD) each.

Autograph Sessions

  • Saturday: 1:00 PM ~ 8:00 PM (MESZ)
  • Sunday: 11:00 AM ~ 3:00 PM and 4:00 PM ~ 5:00 PM (MESZ)

For more information about the performances, you can visit Dokomi’s Facebook page. The program for the convention can be found here, but only a German version is available. Stay tuned to VNN for any news updates and for a report from our German team who will be on site for you!

Official Links

Dokomi’s Website
Dokomi’s Twitter
Dokomi’s Facebook

The post VoxWave and BIGHEAD at Dokomi! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: LEORA’s Voice Provider (TBK) Debut Album!
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
In case you haven’t heard, the French company VoxWave is releasing a new Alter/Ego alongside ALYS named LEORA, and she is voiced by TBK. For more information on LEORA, you can check out our previous article. Who is TBK? TBK is not only the voice provider of LEORA but also a Youtaite that sings a variety …

The post LEORA’s Voice Provider (TBK) Debut Album! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In case you haven’t heard, the French company VoxWave is releasing a new Alter/Ego alongside ALYS named LEORA, and she is voiced by TBK.

For more information on LEORA, you can check out our previous article.

Who is TBK?

TBK is not only the voice provider of LEORA but also a Youtaite that sings a variety of genres and styles such as VOCALOID, Alter/Ego, Touhou, and more! She sings in Japanese, French and English as well. But now, TBK is doing a crowdfunding for her debut album Polymorphose! Some of the songs featured on the album include covers such as “Jitter Doll” and “Sous Cette Pluis.”

Cross-fade

 

Rewards

You also have a chance with the lottery ticket that you see above to receive a Forex Print!

If any of the above interests you, then head on over to the crowdfunding page and help out to get your awesome rewards!

You can also check out more of TBK on some of her accounts below!

Links

Polymorphose Crowdfunding

TBK’s YouTube Channel

TBK’s Twitter

TBK’s Facebook Page

The post LEORA’s Voice Provider (TBK) Debut Album! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Leora Voice Sample Released
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
If you are familiar with the Alter/Ego voice bank “ALYS,” then you have most likely heard of LEORA. But if not, let us do a small introduction! LEORA is VoxWave‘s second voice bank and is meant to complement ALYS. Like ALYS, she will be a French virtual singer for the software Alter/Ego. We currently do not …

The post Leora Voice Sample Released appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
If you are familiar with the Alter/Ego voice bank “ALYS,” then you have most likely heard of LEORA. But if not, let us do a small introduction!

LEORA is VoxWave‘s second voice bank and is meant to complement ALYS. Like ALYS, she will be a French virtual singer for the software Alter/Ego. We currently do not have much information on her, but we do know that she is currently in development and that she is voiced by TBK.

You can find her voice samples below. Keep in mind that this is only a pre-Alpha version. The song is actually a cover of an ALYS song, and you can find the song here.

LEORA’s Facebook Page

VoxWave’s Official Website

The post Leora Voice Sample Released appeared first on VNN.
